DOC.detailed_description: A prospective , multi-centre , non-randomized clinical trial follow-up investigation 1 , 6 12 month . Approximately 250 subject enrol 15 Chinese study site . To confirm safety efficacy Passeo-18 Lux DCB interventional treatment new non-stented re-stenotic lesion superficial femoral artery ( SFA ) proximal popliteal artery ( PPA ) Chinese patient population .
